job.title: Maps Evaluation Data Software Engineer
job.description:
Summary
Apple Maps Evaluation team is looking for experienced Data Engineers to join our Metrics Engineering team.


We partner closely with Data Scientists, Program Managers and Product Analysts to measure and improve Apple Maps user experience. You will work with some of the most unique and interesting data sets in the world including: geospatial data, GPS probe data, search logs, real time traffic data, and A/B experiments data.


Our work spans the entire data ecosystem: metrics design, instrumentation, data set design, data quality checks, batch and real time applications, and reporting.


For this role you will be focusing on data science tooling and data governance related projects and dealing with Maps data at massive scale. Our goals are to:


1) Empower our partners in the data science team by building tools and pipelines to support their

needs


2) Engineer solutions to guarantee discoverable, accurate, compliant, and secure management of

data


We are looking for data engineers who love to work closely with their customers and who are excited to solve challenges around data discoverability and management.


Key Qualifications
Passion for building reliable, stable and fast data products that serve customer needs


4+ years of experience in working with large data sets, schema design and dimensional modeling


4+ years of experience in data warehousing and ETL


Expertise in working with SQL


Experience with data processing using Spark, Hadoop, MapReduce and SparkSQL


Experience with real time data processing using Kafka and Storm or Spark Streaming


Experience in Java or Scala and Python


Experience with notebooks e.g. Jupyter, Zeppelin


Description
Partner with Apple Maps Program, Data Science and Engineering teams to understand data needs


Design, build and launch efficient and reliable data pipelines


Create data models for optimal storage and retrieval


Architect and develop new data processing systems to enable quick and easy consumption and augmentation of data


Build data expertise and develop methods to monitor data quality


Define and manage SLA for datasets in your area of responsibility


Education & Experience
- Bachelors or Masters degree in Computer Science or related field, or relevant industry experience

preferred.
